data.name: ConnectingToSever
data.comment: Progress message when connecting to server. {0} is the server uri.

data.name: ConnectLinkText
data.comment: Link text for 'connect' command to initiate a connection with a SonarQube server

data.name: ConnectSectionTitle
data.comment: Title for the SonarQube connection section of the TE SonarQube page

data.name: CancelButtonText
data.comment: Button text (with access key) for canceling an action – access key 'n'

data.name: ConnectButtonText
data.comment: Button text for 'Connect' in SonarQube connect dialog

data.name: ConnectDialogTitle
data.comment: Connect dialog title

data.name: InsecureProtocolWarning
data.value: The URL you entered is not secure. Use HTTPS connections to protect sensitive information.
data.comment: Message warning of consequences of connecting over an insecure channel

data.name: NotEmptyValidatorRequiredField
data.comment: Not empty validator validation failed message - required field

data.name: PasswordLabel
data.comment: Input label for password when connecting to a SonarQube server

data.name: InvalidServerUriFormat
data.comment: Server URI validator error message, formatted. {0} - invalid input string

data.name: SonarQubeServerLabel
data.comment: Input label for SonarQube server URL

data.name: UsernameLabel
data.comment: Input label for username/token when connecting to a SonarQube server

data.name: ExceptionInsecureSchemesIsNotSubset
data.value: Insecure schemes must be a subset of supported schemes
data.comment: Exception message stating that the specified set of insecure schemes was not a subset of all supported schemes

data.name: ConnectionFailed
data.value: Cannot connect to the SonarQube server. Make sure you provided the correct connection information, including your sign-in credentials, and [try again](). See more information in the output window (SonarLint).
data.comment: The error message the user sees when the connection has failed. The message will appear in team explorer. Localization note: '[try again]()' is a special markup used to translate the text 'try again' into a hyperlink. Make sure to keep it localized content in with that format to avoid reducing functionality in the localized version of the product

data.name: BindButtonText
data.comment: Button text for binding a SonarQube project to a VS solution

data.name: CancelLinkText
data.comment: Link text for canceling an action

data.name: UsernameRequired
data.value: If a password is specified, a username must also be specified.
data.comment: Error message indicating that the username field is required if the password field is not empty

data.name: InvalidCharacterColon
data.value: Colon (":") is not a permitted character.
data.comment: Error message indicating that the string must not contain an a colon (":") as is it an invalid character

data.name: ProjectToolTipProjectNameFormat
data.comment: SonarQube project tooltip for project name (with 'bound' marker indicating the project is bound to the current solution). {0} - project name

data.name: ProjectToolTipKeyFormat
data.comment: SonarQube project tooltip for project key. {0} - project key

data.name: BindingProjectsDisplayMessage
data.comment: Display message

data.name: QualityProfileDownloadFailedMessageFormat
data.value: Failed to download quality profile. Name: '{0}', Key: '{1}', Language: '{2}'
data.comment: Output window message indicating the quality profile file failed to download. {0} quality profile name, {1} quality profile key, {2} language name.

data.name: QualityProfileDownloadSuccessfulMessageFormat
data.value: Successfully downloaded quality profile. Name: '{0}', Key: '{1}', Language: '{2}'
data.comment: Output window message indicating the quality profile file was successfully downloaded. {0} quality profile name, {1} quality profile key, {2} language name.

data.name: RuleSetDescription
data.comment: Generated rule set description.

data.name: UnexpectedWorkflowError
data.comment: Error message in case of an unexpected exception during workflow execution. {0} exception message.

data.name: RefreshCommandDisplayText
data.comment: Refresh command display text

data.name: RefreshCommandTooltip
data.value: Will refetch the SonarQube projects from the server using the existing credentials
data.comment: Refresh command tooltip

data.name: ServerNoProjectsInlineText
data.comment: Text to be displayed inline next to the connected SonarQube server in the Team Explorer tree view when there are no SonarQube Projects available under the given server

data.name: ServerNoProjectsToolTipText
data.value: This server has no available projects with which to bind to. Please create at least one project and then refresh this connection.
data.comment: Tool tip text to be displayed for the connected SonarQube server in the Team Explorer tree view when there are no SonarQube Projects available under the given server

data.name: RuleSetGenerationProgressMessage
data.comment: A progress notification message

data.name: FailedDuringNuGetPackageInstall
data.value: Failed to install NuGet package '{0}' for project '{1}'. Message: {2}
data.comment: Output window message in case of failure - {0} nuget package id, {1} project name, {2} message

data.name: FailedToToBindSolution
data.value: Failed to bind the solution to SonarQube project, [try again](). See more information in the output window (SonarLint).
data.comment: Team explorer notification in case of a failure to bind a solution to SonarQube project ocalization note: '[try again]()' is a special markup used to translate the text 'try again' into a hyperlink. Make sure to keep it localized content in with that format to avoid reducing functionality in the localized version of the product

data.name: BindingSolutionPrefixMessageFormat
data.comment: Output window message prefix that will be common to all the steps (more than one) in the binding workflow. {0} the step specific message in that workflow.

data.name: FinishedSolutionBindingWorkflowSuccessful
data.comment: A progress notification message

data.name: StartedSolutionBindingWorkflow
data.comment: A progress notification message

data.name: SyncButtonText
data.comment: Button text for syncing an already bound SonarQube project to a VS solution

data.name: ShowAllProjectsCommandText
data.comment: Server context menu command display text to show all projects (inc. unbound projects)

data.name: ToggleShowAllProjectsCommandTooltip
data.value: Toggle visibility of unbound projects for this server.
data.comment: Server context menu command tool tip text to show all projects

data.name: FailedToDeserializeSQCOnfiguration
data.value: Failed loading file: '{0}'. Please rebind solution to create a new configuration file.
data.comment: Output window message in case of deserialization error. {0} file path.

data.name: ExpectedAbsoluteUris
data.value: The target URI must be an absolute URI
data.comment: Exception message

data.name: FailedToDeleteCredentials
data.comment: Exception message. {0} - the name of the thing we failed to delete.

data.name: UnexpectedTokenType
data.comment: Exception message

data.name: BoundProjectNotFound
data.value: Bound project with key '{0}' was not found on the connected server. Select a different SonarQube project, or use [a different login]() that has access to the desired project.
data.comment: Team explorer error message when a persisted bound project is not found. {0} - SonarQube project key.

data.name: ConnectingToSonarQubePrefixMessageFormat
data.comment: Output window message format. {0} the messages associated with the connection will all have this prefix and {0} will be the actual message.

data.name: ConnectionResultCancellation
data.comment: The place holder value in ConnectingToSonarQubePrefixMessageFormat

data.name: ConnectionResultFailure
data.comment: The place holder value in ConnectingToSonarQubePrefixMessageFormat

data.name: ConnectionResultSuccess
data.comment: The place holder value in ConnectingToSonarQubePrefixMessageFormat

data.name: HideUnboundProjectsCommandText
data.comment: Server context menu command display text to show all projects (inc. unbound projects)

data.name: DownloadingQualityProfileProgressMessage
data.comment: A progress notification message e.g. "Downloading quality profile: C#"

data.name: AutomationServerDescription
data.comment: Narrator description of a SonarQube server node in the Team Explorer. {0} server URL

data.name: AutomationProjectBoundDescription
data.comment: Narrator description of a bound SonarQube project node in the Team Explorer. {0} project name

data.name: AutomationServerNoProjectsDescription
data.value: SonarQube server: {0}. This server has no projects.
data.comment: Narrator description of an empty SonarQube server node in the Team Explorer. {0} server URL

data.name: TeamExplorerPageTitle
data.comment: Title for the SonarQube Team Explorer page

data.name: MissingService
data.comment: Exception message indicating the package could not acquire the given service. {0} service name

data.name: WarningsSettingsCategory
data.comment: Warnings settings category for Security options page

data.name: CannotCompareVersionStrings
data.value: A SonarQube server plugin has a malformed version and cannot be compared. Version was '{0}'.
data.comment: Exception message indicating that the provided version string is malformed and cannot be compared. {0} version string

data.name: FailedToUnpackAdditionalFiles
data.value: Failed to unpack additional files required for analyzers
data.comment: Output window message indicating failure when unpacking additional files for analyzers

data.name: UnpackingAdditionalFile
data.comment: Progress message indicating an additional files is being unpacked. {0} additional file name

data.name: MoreInfoLinkText
data.comment: Link text for getting more information about SonarQube

data.name: ProductAuthors
data.comment: Authors of the product

data.name: SonarQubeDescription
data.value: SonarQube is an open source platform to manage code quality. Connect your solution to an existing SonarQube Server to get the same issues in Visual Studio and in your SonarQube server.
data.comment: Short descriptive text about SonarQube shown on the Team Explorer invitation card.

data.name: SonarQubeName
data.comment: Name of SonarQube server product

data.name: FinishedSolutionBindingWorkflowNotAllPackagesInstalled
data.value: Not all NuGet packages were installed. Please see output above for more information.
data.comment: Output message indicating not all NuGet packages were installed during the binding workflow

data.name: UnexpectedErrorMessageFormat
data.value:
{0}: Unexpected error: {1}.
You can help us improve by reporting this bug at {2}.
data.comment: {0} - the class name, {1} - error message, {2} url. This is the general format to use when writing errors to output window or when there might not be enough context for the user to understand where is the error coming from.

data.name: CouldNotFindCodeAnalysisRuleSetPropertyOnProject
data.value: Warning: could not find CodeAnalysisRuleSet for project '{0}'
data.comment: Warning message. '{0}' project unique name

data.name: DownloadingServerSettingsProgessMessage
data.comment: Progress message about downloading server settings

data.name: NoProjectsApplicableForBinding
data.value: None (for selected SonarQube project's quality profile)
data.comment: Output window message indicating the current solution does not contain any projects that are applicable to the currently selected SonarQube project's quality profile.

data.name: InvalidTestProjectRegexPattern
data.value: Test project regular expression pattern '{0}' is invalid. The default will be used instead. Please check your server settings.
data.comment: Warning output message indicating that the test project name regex was invalid. {0} invalid regex pattern

data.name: ProjectFilterDteProjectFailedToGetIVs
data.value: Could not get the IVsHierarchy/IVsBuildPropertyStorage for the given project is IVsBuildPropertyStorage for the given EnvDTE.Project
data.comment: Exception message indicating was unable to get the equivalent IVs objects for the passed EnvDTE.Project.

data.name: ViewInSonarQubeMenuItemDisplayText
data.comment: Menu item display text for the contextual command to view the SonarQube dashboard for the current item in the user's browser.

data.name: ViewInSonarQubeMenuItemTooltip
data.value: Open the dashboard for this project in SonarQube using your web browser.
data.comment: Tooltip text for view project in SonarQube context menu item

data.name: BrowserServerMenuItemTooltip
data.value: Browse the server in your web browser.
data.comment: Tooltip text for browser server context menu item

data.name: BrowseServerMenuItemDisplayText
data.comment: Context menu item text for opening the server in the users's browser

data.name: SolutionIsClosed
data.value: The operation requires an open solution.

data.name: SonarLintInfoBarUpdateCommandIsBusyRetry
data.value: Could not update the binding because the command is not currently available. Please try again and ensure that the solution is not building or currently being debugged.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintInfoBarUnboundProjectsMessage
data.value: SonarLint: a binding update is required. See output window (SonarLint) for more information.
data.comment: Info bar message

data.name: SonarLintInfoBarUpdateCommandText
data.comment: Info bar command text

data.name: SonarLintCheckingForUnboundProjects
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintFailedToAttachInfoBarToErrorList
data.value: Failed to attach info bar to error list tool window.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintNoUnboundProjectWereFound
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintInfoBarUpdateCommandRetryNoActiveSection
data.value: The SonarQube Team Explorer page was closed and we cannot proceed with the update. Please try again.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintInfoBarUpdateCommandInvalidSolutionBindings
data.value: The current solution is not bound to the expected SonarQube project, aborting.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintOutputPaneTitle
data.comment: Output pane title

data.name: SonarQubeOptionalServiceFailed
data.value: Warning failed calling '{0}' (http error code={1}). Some of the functionality will be reduced.
data.comment: Output window message. {0} - service {1} - http error code

data.name: SonarLintProfileCheck
data.value: Checking if SonarQube Quality profile has changed.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintProfileCheckDifferentProfile
data.value: The SonarQube project is using a different Quality Profile. Update is required.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintProfileCheckFailed
data.value: Unexpected failure getting quality profile information. Automatic quality profile update will not be performed.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintProfileCheckNoProfiles
data.value: The binding information is out of date. Update is required.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintProfileCheckProfileUpdated
data.value: The Quality Profile for the SonarQube project has changed. Update is required.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintProfileCheckQualityProfileIsUpToDate
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintProfileCheckSolutionRequiresMoreProfiles
data.value: The solution has changed and now requires additional Quality Profiles to be included. Update is required.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: SonarLintInfoBarOldBindingFile
data.value: SonarLint can now tell you when the quality profile in SonarQube project is updated. Press Update to enable this feature now.
data.comment: Info bar message

data.name: NoProjectsExcludedFromBinding
data.value: None (for selected SonarQube project's quality profile)
data.comment: Output window message indicating the current solution does not contain any projects filtered out from the currently selected SonarQube project's quality profile.

data.name: SubTextPaddingFormat
data.comment: Output window message format. Used whenever the message should be displayed as a sub-message from a step message so the user can clearly identify the grouping. {0} the actual message to display.

data.name: SonarQubeRuleSetNameFormat
data.comment: Format used to build the project specific ruleset file name. {0} SonarQube project name. {1} SonarQube quality profile name.

data.name: SonarQubeQualityProfilePageUrlFormat
data.comment: Used to create the Quality Profile URL. This will be integrated as part of the ruleset description. {0} the server URL. {1} the quality profile key.

data.name: CannotDownloadQualityProfileForLanguage
data.value: Cannot download the quality profile for language {0}
data.comment: Output window message displayed when the application failed to download the quality profile associated to a language. {0} the language name.

data.name: NoSonarAnalyzerActiveRulesForQualityProfile
data.value: There are no active rules on the selected Quality Profile '{0}' for Language {1} (rules from the SonarAnalyzer repository). Connected mode requires at least one active rule. Note that third party rules are excluded from SonarLint
data.comment: Output window message displayed when the result from the API export call returns no active rule from the SonarAnalyzer repository. {0} The name of the Quality Profile. {1} the language.

data.name: Bind_SavingBindingConfiguration
data.comment: Message for save step in new binding mode

data.name: Bind_FailedToSaveConfiguration
data.comment: Message for save error in new binding workflow

data.name: Bind_NuGetAnalyzersNoLongerInstalled
data.value: INFO: SonarLint connected mode no longer installs the analyzers NuGet packages. The analyzers embedded in the VSIX are used instead.

data.name: Notifications_NotSupported
data.value: Notifications are not supported on this version of SonarQube
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: Telemetry_ERROR_Recording
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: Telemetry_ERROR_SendingTelemetry
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: Suppressions_NotConnected
data.value: Cannot fetch suppressions - not connected to a SonarQube server
data.comment: Warning in output window

data.name: SCCFS_FailedToCheckOutFilesForEditing
data.value: Failed to check out files for editing. Error flags: {0}
data.comment: Output window message showing the tagVSQueryEditResultFlags enum value(s)

data.name: SCCFS_FailedToCheckOutFilesForSave
data.value: Failed to check out files for saving. Error code: {0}
data.comment: Output window message showing the tagVSQuerySaveResult enum value

data.name: FailedToCreateBindingConfigForLanguage
data.value: Failed to create the configuration for language {0}
data.comment: Output window message displayed when the application failed to fetch and create the binding configuration associated with a language. {0} the language name.

data.name: FailedToCheckIfTestProject
data.value: Error identifying project '{0}' as test project: {1}
data.comment: Error message indicating that an error occured while checking if a project is a test project

data.name: RulesetSerializer_FailedToLoadRuleset
data.value: Ruleset could not be loaded. File: {0}, Error: {1}
data.comment: Output window message for unloadable ruleset

data.name: RulesetSerializer_RulesetDoesNotExist
data.comment: Output window message for a ruleset that does not exist on disc

data.name: ExclusionGetError
data.value: Error loading server settings. Analysis settings from the server (e.g. inclusions/exclusions) will not be applied in the IDE. Error: {0}

data.name: SaveExclusionsFailed
data.value: Failed to retrieve/process server settings. Error: {0}

data.name: SonarLintFoundUnboundSolution
data.value: Some binding configuration is missing. Please rebind the solution.
data.comment: Output window message

data.name: BindingUpdateFailedToCheckSettings
data.value: [Binding check] Error checking bound project settings file: {0}
